name: AFI Compare to Aroma 360 Black (M) by Perry Ellis® F35285
description: Compare to Aroma 360 Black (M) by Perry Ellis® F35285 is a captivating fragrance oil designed for men. This seductive scent combines spicy and aromatic notes to create an alluring experience. The fragrance opens with a blend of amber, nutmeg, and ginger, which adds warmth and depth. Hints of cardamom and basil bring a touch of freshness and sophistication to the composition. The fragrance is further enhanced with musky tobacco and suede, providing a sensual and mysterious undertone. Aroma 360 Black can be enjoyed in various applications such as body wash, candles, incense, shampoo, and soap.
